data.title: Convert Mauritian Rupees (MUR) and Seychelles Rupees (SCR): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in Mauritian Rupee (MUR) to and from Seychelles Rupee (SCR) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This Mauritian Rupee and Seychelles Rupee convertor is up to date with exchange rates from May 26, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of Mauritian Rupee. Use "Swap currencies" to make Seychelles Rupee the default currency. Click on Seychelles Rupees or Mauritian Rupees to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

The Mauritian Rupee is the currency in Mauritius (MU, MUS). The Seychelles Rupee is the currency in Seychelles (SC, SYC). The symbol for MUR can be written Mau Rs. The symbol for SCR can be written SR. The Mauritian Rupee is divided into 100 cents. The Seychelles Rupee is divided into 100 cents. The exchange rate for the Mauritian Rupee was last updated on May 23, 2024 from The International Monetary Fund. The exchange rate for the Seychelles Rupee was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The MUR conversion factor has 6 significant digits. The SCR conversion factor has 5 significant digits.
